pluginstrument.type: Garmin G3000 / 5000 PFD MFD Bezel Overlay
pluginstrument.author: Yves Levesque - modified by Joe "Cruchmeister" Gilker
pluginstrument.description:
GENERIC GARMIN G3000 / 5000 Bezel Overlay
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION - http://simstrumentation.com
Version info: - **v2.0** - 2022-12-11
NOTES: The following options are available and can be set via user properties in the instrument once placed in your panel layout:
- Select Pilot PFD or MFD - Show / hid softkeys - Display a raised metallic or inset Garmin logo - show light glare on the screen.
